text: China Railway Materials Commercial Corp. (CRMCC, ) is a state-owned company of China, under the supervision of State-owned Assets Supervision and Administration Commission of the State Council. The predecessor of the group was the Materials Administration Bureau of the Ministry of Railways (). The major subsidiary of the group was China Railway Materials Co., Ltd. (CRM, ). In 2010, most of the assets of CRMCC was injected to CRM, excluding the investment vehicle of CRMCC: China Railway Materials Investment ();Draft prospectus of the IPO China Railway Materials Company Limited (in Chinese) A plan to float CRM in Shanghai and Hong Kong Stock Exchange was announced in the same year. However, the company did not proceed the initial public offering. In 2014 CRMCC was renamed from to current name . The company was a partner of former Australian listed company FerrAUS Limited,http://www.asx.com.au/asxpdf/20090908/pdf/31klr2m0rt95n0.pdf Swiss company African Iron Ore Group and British listed company African Minerals Limited. ==References== ==External links== * China Railway Materials Commercial Corporate * China Railway Materials Company Limited Category:Government-owned companies of China Category:Organizations established in 1949
title: China Railway Materials
